heisigComment: * As a primitive, this character will take the sense of a compass, the instrument used to determine direction.
heisigStory: Spinning a dagger about on its hilt on the top of a top hat - waiting to see in which direction it points when it comes to rest - one leaves to fate where one is going next. Take care in writing this character.
koohiiStory1: Note: The primitives are top hat and bound up. Compare ten thousand (#64). Story: A rich man wearing a top hat and bound up from head to toe hobbles up to you and asks for directions to the nearest police station because he just escaped from his kidnappers.
koohiiStory2: I always keep my directions bound to the bottom of my top hat so I won´t lose them.
